title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Applying Human Performance Improvement (HPI) in K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Curriculum Design Knowledge and Fundamental Understanding of HPI and Collaborative Learning
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain step-by-step application methods of the HPI process in K12 educational settings using collaborative autoethnography
Learners can establish educational improvement strategies by analyzing actual cases and utilizing HPI tools (problem diagnosis, performance gap analysis, etc.)
Learners can propose ways to link HPI implementation outcomes to organizational change through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
